name: Fakemon: Chromafire (Beanos Update)
description:
Critic Reviews: "Fakemon: Chromefire is the hit game that has everyone talking. In this game you amazing features such as: walking, running, even more walking! Commit genocide against mass amounts of innocent creatures while you try to reach the actual bad monster that is doing the bad stuff. Save a village from starvation in this Code Ninjas Game which is part of of the BEANOS cinematic universe. What are you waiting for? Go fight some incredibly broken monsters in FAKEMON: CHROMAFIRE!!!"

- Beanos from the hit Code Ninjas Game, Time Swap
